7.eng-name: The Book of the Adhan (The Call to Prayer)

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu 'Ubaidah said:"Abdullah said: 'The idolaters kept the Prophet (S.A.W) from (offering) four prayers on the day of Al-Khandaq, so he commanded Bilal to call the Adhan, then he said the Iqamah and prayed Zuhr, then he said the Iqamah and prayed 'Asr, then he said the Iqamah and prayed the Maghrib, then he said the Iqamah and prayed 'Isha

chapter.ara-name: باب الاِجْتِزَاءِ لِذَلِكَ كُلِّهِ بِأَذَانٍ وَاحِدٍ وَالإِقَامَةِ لِكُلِّ وَاحِدَةٍ مِنْهُمَا
chapter.eng-name: The Acceptability For All Of That With One Adhan And An Iqamah For Each One Of Them
